00019 #include "Logs.h"
00020 
00022 static int log_initialized = 0;
00023 
00025 static int redirected = 0;
00026 
00028 static unsigned char debug_level;
00029 
00031 static char* output_filename;
00032 
00034 static FILE* output_file;
00035 
00036 int setupLogs(int redirect, unsigned char debugLevel , char* const outputFilename ) {
00037     redirected = redirect;
00038     output_filename     = outputFilename;
00039     debug_level = debugLevel;
00040 
00041     output_file = fopen(output_filename, "a+");
00042     if(output_file == NULL) return 1;
00043 
00044     fprintf(output_file, "**** OUTPUT LOG :\n");
00045 
00046     log_initialized = 1;
00047     return 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int closeLogs() {
00051     log_initialized = 0;
00052     fprintf(output_file, "\n");
00053     return (fclose(output_file) == EOF) ? 1 : 0;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void addEntry(unsigned char level, const char* const message) {
00057     if(log_initialized) {
00058         if(level <= debug_level) {
00059             char* levelBuffer;
00060             switch(level) {
00061             case(ERROR):
00062                 levelBuffer = "ERROR";
00063                 break;
00064             case(WARNING):
00065                 levelBuffer = "WARNING";
00066                 break;
00067             case(DRAWING):
00068                 levelBuffer = "DRAWING";
00069                 break;
00070             case(DISASSEMBLY):
00071                 levelBuffer = "DISASSEMBLY";
00072                 break;
00073             case(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION):
00074                 levelBuffer = "LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION";
00075                 break;
00076 
00077             default:
00078                 levelBuffer = "DEBUG";
00079             }
00080 
00081             fprintf(output_file, "[%s] %s\n", levelBuffer, message);
00082             if(redirected) printf("[%s] %s\n", levelBuffer, message);
00083         }
00084     }
00085 }
